chapter.xreflabel: Examples of reading or writing NeXus data files
chapter.title: Examples of writing and reading NeXus data files
chapter.para: Simple examples of reading and writing NeXus data files are provided in the chapter of Volume I and also in the chapter of Volume II. Here, three examples are provided showing how to write a NeXus data file without using the NAPI.

section.xreflabel: Code Examples that use the NAPI
section.title: Code Examples that use the NAPI
section.para: Various examples are given that show how to read and write NeXus data files using the .

section.xreflabel: Code Examples that do not use the NAPI
section.title: Code Examples that do not use the NAPI
section.para: Sometimes, for whatever reason, it is necessary to write or read NeXus files without using the routines provided by the . Each example is written to support just one of the low-level file formats supported by NeXus (HDF4, HDF5, or XML).
